title: posh chewy cookies
description: Luxurious fruit, nuts and liqueur make these satisfyingly chewy cookies ideal for a special occasion.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz unsalted butter, softened, plus extra for greasing
200g/7oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
100g/3½oz dried sour cherries, soaked in water
100g/3½oz white chocolate, broken into small pieces
100g/3½oz dark chocolate, broken into small pieces
